title: unable to log into riot games support website

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I wanted to send in a support ticket for my "will draw for rp" drawing, but whenever i try to log into the website it says "you have been logged out" and then redirects me to the page that i have taken a screenshot of. this happens every single time.

replies.body: Hmmmm that's odd. You might need to [**clear your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) or try launching the window in a different browser. Or, you could always pop that drawing here for me as well and I can get those poros to work!

I've already tried those solutions, so it's really helpful that i can include the drawing here! I've heard from a friend who's already done this and they told me that i would need to include how much rp i need and a reason for it, so :

I would like 26 rp so that I would be able to buy Freljord Taliyah when it goes on sale (hopefully soon)

https://gyazo.com/c69dcb49466627c8025cf66dee3b70cc
That's the link to a gyazo of the drawing^^^^

(i haven't figured out how to include the drawing's file, so i just included a screenshot of it)

Thanks!

Ayyyyyyy that Taliyah is pretty nice! Make sure to check your RP the next time you login, as I've got a couple poros on the way with a little gift. Thanks for sending me that neat drawing ^_^!!

PS: In the future, you can share images by right clicking on it, clicking copy image url, and pasting the url here.
